question.xref: DES s6, DES s10, HC r208
question.text: There are flashing amber lights under a school warning sign. What action should you take?

explanation.text: The flashing amber lights are switched on to warn you that children may be crossing near a school. Slow down and take extra care as you may have to stop.

answer.text: Reduce speed until you are clear of the area
Keep up your speed and sound the horn
Increase your speed to clear the area quickly
Wait at the lights until they change to green
